name: Zhuw3.GitHub.io
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored,  Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

### Python in Finance
We use Python in some of our classes, and here is some of my work:
* [Basics notebook](https://github.com/zhuw3/QFRM-Python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)

### Papers

### About me
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Vanderbilt University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
